title: LF people to play norms with
body:
Just looking for some people to play norms with, most of the people i played with quit or just play too rarely so just looking for some people to chill with. I'm plat 2 but i don't care what your rank is its just normal games maybe i could help you improve. I play top and mid so other roles would be welcome. thanks. 
IGN = Comrade

replies.body:
yo i added you to play some norms.

i'm currently aiming to play a few champs in order to get an S ranking and i'll probably try to do that in norms in a group
Hey, I'm actually looking for a solid team mate to play with (Brisbane time) I main support, Gold 5, IGN: StarPhil

Hi, I'm normally available a decent amount, would be happy to play. Currently sorting out some issues with my internet. Feel free to add me if you feel like playing.

IGN: KarI Marx (karl spelt with a capital i instead of a lowercase L)
